definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
"fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
to warm up (sports)/(fig.) to prepare/to get in condition

sentences.english: Madame Defarge was one of the leading spirits of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 迪法热夫人是这场革命的主要人物之一。

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 电机过热时，热保护器将会中断电流。

sentences.english: One hot steak on a sizzlin' platter.
sentences.chinese: 一份热牛排，还在盘子里咝咝作响呢。

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 对于平板玻璃，热退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 热环境舒适度指标是建筑节能设计的关键之一。

sentences.english: The isosteric heats of adsorption were determined from the isotherms and the factors that influence their variations were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 从等温线确定了等量吸附热并讨论了其影响因素。

sentences.english: It's very hot, sa the horseman decides to give the horses a bath.
sentences.chinese: 天气非常热，所以养马人决定给马儿们洗个澡。

sentences.english: Hardness was quiet different in different zone of fusion welding joint.
sentences.chinese: 熔焊接头硬度分布不均匀，热影响区是薄弱环节。

sentences.english: The climate here is always hot, summer and winter alike .
sentences.chinese: 这里的气候总是那么热，夏季和冬季都一样。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全国人大常委会副委员长热地参加了上述活动。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the experiment of temperature-thermal Errors of CNC machine tools is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要论述了数控机床热误差实验。

sentences.english: A hot beanbag may be just the cure you need.
sentences.chinese: 一个热的装着豆类的布袋正好能满足你的需要。

sentences.english: Curing property of the adhesive was studied by thermal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 通过热分析，研究了该发泡胶的固化特性。

sentences.english: An old hot coffee pot is on the sock.
sentences.chinese: 袜子上有一个热的旧咖啡壶。

sentences.english: Hot massage for a while, and then use a spoon to stimulate it to soak in cold water.
sentences.chinese: 热按摩片刻后，再用一把泡在冷水里的匙子刺激该处。

definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to trend/to get popular quickly/sudden heat wave (weather)
to get angry/to suffer from excessive internal heat (TCM)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
